thread.title: Paige L.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Paige L.

author: Paige L.
title: Paige L.
text: The customer service was exceptional! Three kinds of tires within my price range were reviewed with me. I was informed about what each tire was best used for, so I was able to make a decision that was best suited for me. The install took about an hour and half and I was on my way! Thank you to Town Fair Tire for making my experience a great one!
